messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Sandra and others too
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/19/03 5:08:48 PM, mummy124@bellsouth.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/19/03 5:08:48 PM, mummy124@... writes:

<< He liked you right away when he first discovered you and saw you
recommend Ferris Buellers Day Off for a movie! Anyway, he told me tell you
thanks >>

Cool! Thanks for letting me know. <g>

I really hope things get sweet for you guys. It has amazed me seeing how
just a one degree change in direction, changes the destination down the line,
and further away the longer the time spent going that direction, but when
someone can just stop and say "Wait, I see where this goes and I don't want
to go there" and makes a 90 degree turn, life is never the same!!

Sandra

messages.subject: Sandra and others too
messages.msgSnippet: Just wanted to send a thank you to you from my husband. I have printed things from this list lately for him to read in regard to Sierra and what has been going
messages.messageBody:
Just wanted to send a thank you to you from my husband. I have printed things from this list lately for him to read in regard to Sierra and what has been going on. He has also "found you" on his own searches during the day at work when he's looking up things about unschooling. He liked you right away when he first discovered you and saw you recommend Ferris Buellers Day Off for a movie! Anyway, he told me tell you thanks, that he likes you, of course followed by him not liking many people. That's true!

And thank you to all of you who have suggested things to help. I printed them all up and Joe and I have gone over them. They make sense to us and we are trying to see this in a whole different light.

Mary B and Joe


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
